rukus.text: You who believe, should I advise you of a deal that saves you from a painful punishment
Believe in God and His messenger, and try hard in God's way with your possessions and lives. That is better for you if you knew
He forgives your sins, and admits you into gardens which rivers flow through them and to good houses in eternal gardens. That is the great victory
And other (thing that) you love it, help from God and a forthcoming victory. And give good news to the believers

You who believe, be God's helpers, as Jesus son of Mary told his apostles: who are my helpers toward God? The apostles said: we are God's helper. So a group of children of Israel believed and a group disbelieved. Then We helped those who believed against their enemies, and they became victorious
